pr_title: Configure Subnetwork Trace: Amend UI sizing

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of separating this, you might be able to add a CSS rule that puts some padding on the bottom of the label?
The easier alternative would be, since it's only one element, to get rid of the outer HBox here and the behaviour would be the same:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    <HBox>
          
          
            
                        <Label text="Define new conditions:"/>
          
          
            
                    </HBox>
          
          
            
                    <Label text="Define new conditions:"/>
